scenes.action_text: AMERICAN MILKSHAKE Written by David Andalman Co-writer, Mariko Munro 9/28/2011 INT. OLD FASHIONED STAGE Circa 1900. A white man in a top hat introduces the final act of a black face performance. TOP HAT MAN In the spirit of true minstrelsy, you have again shown that laughter is the wine of life.
